We're proud to celebrate 20 years supporting the Atlanta innovation sector. A big thanks to our clients, partners and employees for helping us reach this milestone.

It's been a wonderful journey since the close of the Brightree Acquisition by ResMed. The ResMed - Brightree partnership shares the same goal of advancing the post acute (HME and Home Health/Hospice) industry and improve patient lives. It's great to be recognized for our passion ...thank you ACG for the award of the "deal of the year"!

I never turned off my text alerts from Zip Recruiter because the job postings are usually so full of typos and errors, they are amusing.  “Phil” from Zip is always sending me irrelevant and error-filed postings.  Plus, it's nice to get a reminder every few weeks of how I should give up on life and become an Uber driver.

This one, however, amused me.  I blurred the name of the company because I don’t want them getting swamped with applications.  I mean, the chance to be a contractor who gets paid $15 a year is just too good to pass up. I wonder if I put 10% of that into their 401k, would they match it enough so I would get an extra quarter?  #gigeconomy

MDI Group is a results-driven, professional services firm providing IT solutions that enable clients to achieve business objectives.MDI Group delivers flexible IT workforce solutions backed by subject matter expertise. Our IT workforce solutions enable Fortune 500 and mid-market clients to achieve critical business objectives. We ensure our clients’ IT project teams are directly aligned with business objectives, effectively staffed and successfully executed to drive business performance and results. As an IT certified business and a recognized thought leader in supplier diversity, MDI Group helps clients achieve a more inclusive workforce.MDI's services range from contract and contract-to-hire placements to project teams and end-to-end processes that maximize the engagement and management of contract labor.Take a look at our website at www.mdigroup.com for more information. I look forward to connecting with you. Currently Recruiting IT talent for Phoenix AZ, you can reach me at rlee@mdigroup.com or message me here.
